description.author: Salesforce
text: Component that represents a toggle switch inside a table cell, allowing users to toggle a value and dispatch events for changes.

elements.name: toggleSwitchContainer
elements.description: Represents the container that holds the toggle switch

elements.name: toggleSwitchInput
elements.description: Represents the lightning input toggle switch that can be toggled on or off

text: Check that the toggle switch container is present and visible
